FWT.content: Derrida doesn’t want deconstruction to be used to denigrate, injure, diminish necessity of force of movement, and if it is necessary to do so in polemics, he regrets it in advance

DST.content: Lacoue-Labarthe is not panting, harried, he is hunting (traque) (polemos w/out polemics) the most powerful thoughts of our tradition

RM.content: RM not in a polemical spirit: it’s often because I subscribe to Ricouer’s propositions (whose text he can’t do justice) that I protest > they’re already there in what I wrote

LI.content: Derrida introduces Sarl (société à responsabilité limitée), wrong to find his discourse polemical > desires & phantasms at stake in proper name, signature, copyright
Sarl’s loyalty & absence of simulation so rare in French-language polemics (a strategy that is artful, indirect)
what symptoms can this polemical “scene” make legible?
Derrida refuses insults, too much the norm, come all too easily
